description: This file contains CSS styles for a Tic Tac Toe web application, defining theme variables, layout, and element appearances.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered alignment and background.

classes.name: game-controls
classes.description: Container for game control buttons with flex layout.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Base style for buttons, including hover effects.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout for the game board with responsive properties.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Style for individual cells in the game board.
